question: Many a times we read in the newspapers about margin requirements. Which of the following correctly indicates margin requirements?
option1: Margin requirements aim at the regulation of the volume of credit as well as flow of the credit
option2: Margin requirements imply that every bank has to keep certain minimum cash reserves with the reserve bank of India
option3: Margin requirements imply that every bank has to keep certain proportion of its total deposits in the form of cash with it self
option4: Margin requirements imply to a cushion against the decline in the value of the security
answer: Margin requirements imply to a cushion against the decline in the value of the security
explanation:
Option 1: Quantitative control aim at the regulation of the volume of credit as well as flow of the credit, qualitative control aim at the regulation of flow of the credit.
Option 2 : every bank has to keep certain minimum cash reserves with the reserve bank of India - Cash Reserve Requirements,
3- every bank has to keep certain proportion of its total deposits in the form of cash with it self-Statutory Liquidity ratio,
Option 4 - certain rate at which it discounts the bills of exchange of the commercial bank -Bank Rate .
